name: The Intership Program
description:
Hire new interns and train them to become the next generation of employees. Decide on the key stats figure, and remain on the budget!

Ah, the new guy needs some help hey... Well, let's not just stand there... It seems the boss wants you to hire new interns... And train them... Share your knowledge? Anyway, so remember to stick to the budget, or the boss will be upset...

This was intented for the backtrace.io gamejame

https://ndg.sp.backtrace.io/
Team:
